abstract: White students and faculty at some of New York City's elite private schools are being asked to reflect on their race and to examine concept of white privilege and how their presence in school community affects those of other races; such sessions reflect change in private school diversity initiatives, which used to solely focus on minorities.
lead_paragraph: In a new type of diversity initiative at elite institutions, students explore privilege and power and are encouraged to think about social justice in a personal way.

headline.main: At New York Private Schools, Challenging White Privilege From the Inside
headline.print_headline: Challenging White Privilege From the Inside

snippet: In a new type of diversity initiative at elite institutions, students explore privilege and power and are encouraged to think about social justice in a personal way.
